What should the college of the future look like? A big question. That’s why@CollegeComm- which we support - is asking for your feedback on their progress report, and thoughts on how they take this forward. Read the report here:http://collegecommission.co.uk/progress-report

Colleges transform lives and communities and will be central to facing the challenges of the future. That’s why we support@CollegeComm. They want to hear your feedback on their new progress report, as well as recommendations they can start to make.http://collegecommission.co.uk/progress-report

The UK faces tough questions about productivity & social justice. Colleges are a vital part of the answer. We're pleased to support@CollegeCommwho has published a new progress report. How do they take this forward across the four nations? Let them know:http://surveymonkey.co.uk/r/futurecollegecommission…

Creating a coaching & mentoring culture in an organisation can lead to development of staff and improvement of their performance. Read how the League Managers Association are implementing this & driving performance through mentoring, in our new case study:https://direc.to/c3Dk

With#apprenticeshipsthere is still much confusion around of what 20% off-the-job really means. Without clarity, the rules are open to interpretation which makes it more prone to slip ups. Avoid the pitfalls with our new guide here:https://direc.to/cU9F

Employers: If you're running#apprenticeships, 20% off-the-job training is required & monitored by law. It becomes a challenging landscape to navigate. Our new guide helps employers better understand what it really means. Download your FREE copy today.https://direc.to/cU1f

Did you know that 20% off-the-job can include training that is delivered at the apprentice’s normal place of work but must not be delivered as part of their normal working duties. Find out more in our new FREE guide:https://direc.to/cU9C
